name: Video Grant Server
description: A server that grants a video access token.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: API username - find your account SID at https://www.twilio.com/user/account/voice-messaging

TWILIO_API_KEY.description: API key - find your auth token at https://www.twilio.com/user/account/voice-messaging

TWILIO_API_SECRET.description: API secret - find your auth token at https://www.twilio.com/user/account/voice-messaging
